column1: margaret o. heiss| margaret o. heiss. born: june 30
column8: georgia following a short illness. margaret was born on june 30
column9: 1927 in washington state to harry l. and olive peggy (saylor) nash and later married elveer bud heiss on august 30
column10: 1946 in fremont. bud preceded her in death on july 2
column11: 2014. margaret is survived by her daughters linda and jeannie
column14: and 5 great grandchildren. memorial services are pending at this time and will be announced latersend sympathy card
